response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to me, but I understand its true worth to you might be $800,000. Considering this, I am willing to negotiate and offer it to you for $950,000. This price reflects my desire to make this transaction beneficial for both parties while ensuring a fair return on my investment. I believe this offer strikes a balance between maximizing the value for you and securing a reasonable profit for me. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
